ValidationRule.description: Validate the Opportunity Paperwork Status is updated when paperwork is received.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( ISCHANGED( Paperwork_Completed1__c), NOT(ISCHANGED( Opportunity_Paperwork_Status__c ))), TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Paperwork Completed field is updated, the Opportunity Paperwork Status field must be updated too.
